REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to renewal of a lease under the stabilization code promulgated by the real estate industry stabilization association
Summary: Relates to renewal of a lease under the stabilization code promulgated by the real estate industry stabilization association; defines demolish.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-511, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to renewal of a lease under the stabilization code
